emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six committee members of 3300 Block Club, including: Missie Yates, Mary Edwards, Lois Spencer, Mary Bailey, Ruth Youngblood wearing striped shirt, and Alberta R. Williams, meeting to plan second annual garden party and fashion show
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg. 14, reads: "BLOCK CLUB SET FOR GARDEN PARTY - 3300 Block Club is giving its second annual garden party and fashion show on the lawn of 3377 Webster Ave. The home of Mrs. Delores Clark is the setting for the attractive affair to which the public is invited. Left to right are committee members: Mmes. Missie Yates, Mary Edwards, Lois Spencer, Mary Bailey, Ruth Youngblood and Alberta R. Williams. Mrs. Billie Brown will emcee the fashion show.  Mrs. Ann Sales is chairman of the program, and Mrs. Blanche Hill, Chairman of decorations. - Harris Photo."
